mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, username, userpwd, email, address, joindate) values(#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{email}, #{address}, now())
mapper.update: update member set userpwd=#{info_pwd}, email=#{info_email}, address=#{info_address} where userid=#{info_id}
mapper.delete: delete from bookmarkarea where userid = #{userid} and addressno = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into bookmarkarea (userid, addressno) value(#{userid}, (select no from baseaddress where city = #{booksido} and gugun = #{bookgugun} and dong = #{bookdong}))
mapper.select: select no, city, gugun, dong from baseaddress a join bookmarkarea b on a.no = b.addressno where b.userid = #{userId};
